items.title: Navigation
items.content: Make a Wisdom (Survival) check to avoid getting lost. Having a map grants advantage on this check.

items.title: Foraging
items.content: Make a Wisdom (Survival) check to find food and water. The DC depends on the abundance of food and water in the region.

items.title: Tracking
items.content: Make a Wisdom (Survival) check to follow tracks. The DC depends on the ground surface and age of the tracks.
